title: David Dorward
summary: David Cameron Dorward  (born January 22, 1952) is a Canadian politician, who represented the electoral district of Edmonton-Gold Bar in the Legislative Assembly of Alberta from 2012 to 2015.  He has lived in Alberta since the mid 1950s and currently resides in Edmonton.Dorward is the approved United Conservative Party candidate for the electoral riding of Edmonton-Gold Bar for the 2019 Alberta provincial election.
